text: Alan Cristian Arario (born 1 April 1995) is an Argentine footballer who plays for Italian Eccellenza club ASD Frattamaggiore Calcio. ==Career== ===Club career=== On 13 December 2019 it was confirmed, that Arario had joined Italian Eccellenza club ASD Frattamaggiore Calcio.FRATTAMAGGIORE CALCIO. I NEROSTELLATI HANNO IL LORO 10: ARARIO SBARCA ALLO “IANNIELLO”, sportcampania.it, 13 December 2019 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Club Atlético River Plate footballers Category:Atlético Madrid footballers Category:A.S. title: Alan Arario
